column2: "Ɔba nyansafo tsie n’egya ne nkyerɛkyerɛ: Naaso ɔtwetwesifo dze
"Nyimpa nam n’anomu aba do bedzi ndzepa. Na nkontompɔtwafo akra dze
"Nyia ɔweɔn n’ano no
column3: osie no nkwa: Na nyia obue n’ano petoo dze

column2: "Ɔkwadwefo kra kɔn dɔ
column3: naaso onnya hwee: Na mbɔdzembɔnyi ne kra dze

column2: "Ɔtseneneenyi kyir atorsɛm: Na omumuyɛnyi dze
"Ndzeyɛtsenenee kora nyia no kwan yɛ tɔɔtsen: Naaso emumuyɛ dze
"Obi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ noho ɔhonyanyi
column3: naaso onnyi hwee: Obi so wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ noho ohianyi

column2: "Nyimpa ne kra n’apondze nye n’ahonya: Na ohianyi dze
"Atseneneefo kan dzɛw huoo: Naaso emumuyɛfo kandzea dze
"Nkontompɔ dze aperper nko ba: Na hɔn a wotsie apam pa no dze
"Hwimhwim adze kɔ sorɔsorɔw
column3: Na nyia ɔdze berɛ boaboa ano no

column2: "Enyidado kyɛr a
column3: ɔma akoma yar: Na sɛ ahwehwɛdze ba mu a

column2: "Obiara a obu asɛm no enyimtsia no
column3: ɔsɛɛ noara noho. Na nyia osuro mbrasɛm dze

column2: "Onyansafo ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛ nkwa nsunyiwa
column3: Dɛ nyimpa dze befi owu mfir mu."

column2: "Ntseasee papa ma enyimpa: Na nkontompɔtwafo kwan dze
"Ɔbadwembanyi biara yɛ edwuma nyimdzee mu: Na ɔkwasea dze
"Ɔsomafo omumuyɛnyi dze mbusu ba: Na ɔnokwafo dze
"Ohia na enyito bɛka nyia ɔpow asotwe: Na nyia obu nkaenyim bi no dze
"Akɔndɔdze a nsa aka no
column3: ɔyɛ ɔkra dɛw: Na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma nkwasea dɛ wobefi mbusu ho."

column2: "Enye enyansafo nnantsew
column3: na ibohu nyansa: Na nkwasea anyɛnkofa dze

column2: "Mbusu tsiw ndzebɔnyɛfo: Na atseneneefo dze
"Nyimpa papa dan ewungyadze gya ne mba hɔn mba; Na ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi n’ahonya dze
"Edziban pii wɔ ehiafo kwa mu. Na bi wɔ hɔ a
"Nyia ɔkam n’abaa no
column3: ɔtan ne ba: Na nyia ɔdɔ no no
column4: ɔhwe no mber a ɔsɛ mu."

column2: "Ɔtseneneenyi dzidzi ma ne kra mee: Na omumuyɛfo dze
